info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 6 at 9:08AM AKDT until July 8 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks AK
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a Red Flag Warning for lightning, which is in effect from noon Monday to midnight AKDT Monday night.
* AFFECTED AREA...South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range, Upper Koyukuk Valley and Dalton Highway Summits.
* TIMING...From noon Monday to midnight AKDT Monday night.
* THUNDERSTORM COVERAGE INDEX...4, Scattered to Numerous.
* WINDS...West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. Stronger gusts are possible in thunderstorms.
* HUMIDITY...As low as 40 percent.
* TEMPERATURES...Highs in the mid 80s. Lows in the upper 30s.
* IMPACTS...Numerous wet thunderstorms across the interior will bring frequent lightning strikes and gusty winds.
info.instruction:
A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public.
Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.

parameter.value: RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT AKDT MONDAY NIGHT FOR LIGHTNING

area.areaDesc: South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range; Upper Koyukuk Valley; Dalton Highway Summits
